legal.agreeToTerms: By registering, you agree to our

acceptance.title: 1. Acceptance of Terms
acceptance.content: By accessing and using Finance Tracker, you agree to be bound by the terms and conditions set forth in this document. If you do not agree with any part of these terms, please do not use our service.

service.title: 2. Description of Service
service.content: Finance Tracker is a personal finance management application that allows users to track income, expenses, manage budgets and accounts. The service is provided 'as is' and we do not guarantee continuous availability.

account.title: 3. User Account
account.content: You are responsible for maintaining the security of your login credentials. You agree to notify us immediately of any unauthorized use of your account. We are not liable for any losses due to unauthorized use of your account.

usage.title: 4. Usage Rules
usage.content: You agree not to use the service for any unlawful or prohibited purposes. You may not attempt unauthorized access to the system, interfere with service operations, or use the service to distribute malicious content.

data.title: 5. User Data
data.content: You own all data you enter into the system. We are committed to protecting your data according to our Privacy Policy. You can export or delete your data at any time.

liability.title: 6. Limitation of Liability
liability.content: Finance Tracker is not responsible for any financial decisions you make based on information from the application. We are not financial advisors and do not provide investment advice.

changes.title: 7. Changes to Terms
changes.content: We reserve the right to modify these terms at any time. Continued use of the service after changes are posted constitutes acceptance of the new terms.

contact.title: 8. Contact
contact.content: If you have questions about the Terms of Service, please contact Admin via email support@duonglien.com or use the support chatbot on the website.

intro.title: 1. Introduction
intro.content: We respect your privacy. This policy describes how we collect, use, and protect your personal information when using Finance Tracker.

collect.title: 2. Information We Collect
collect.content: We collect the following types of information:
collect.item1: Account information: email, display name, password (encrypted)
collect.item2: Financial data: account, transaction, budget information that you enter
collect.item3: Technical information (logged): IP address, browser type, access time

use.title: 3. How We Use Information
use.item1: Provide and maintain the financial management service

security.title: 4. Data Security
security.content: We use industry-standard security measures including SSL/TLS encryption, password hashing, and strict access controls to protect your data.

sharing.title: 5. Information Sharing
sharing.content: We do NOT sell, trade, or share your personal information with third parties, except when required by law or to protect our legitimate interests.

cookies.title: 6. Cookies
cookies.content: We use cookies to store authentication tokens and language preferences. You can disable cookies in your browser but this may affect the application's functionality.

rights.title: 7. Your Rights
rights.content: You have the following rights regarding your data:
rights.item1: Right to access and view personal data
rights.item3: Right to delete your account and all data

contact.title: 8. Privacy Contact
contact.content: If you have questions about the Privacy Policy or wish to exercise your rights, please contact Admin via email privacy@duonglien.com or use the support chatbot on the website.
